channel.title: Preview of Patch 1.1.0 2: Electric Boogaloo
channel.description:
# Patch will be out in the next few days.
## General: * New simplified game mode called Casual. (If it is popular enough, new players will be required to play X number of games of it.) * Old game mode now named Classic. * Everyone can now draw in their deathnote. * Spy/Cult Maid no longer counts as a visit. * Disabled the early game over checks for the time being. (Games would end when they shouldn't, even when things like DK's and abilities were accounted for.) * New female armor and crossbow execution added.
## Assassin: * Distract now usable during trials.
## Enforcer: * Removed Armored passive. * Protection now prevents visits to targeted Unseen member.
## Duchess: * Dark Wisp changed - Discover a player's class. 2 uses.
## King: * Removed Allies from starting King. * Added Night Ability Order to starting King - Prevent a player from voting tomorrow. 4 uses. * Abilities no longer count as visiting.
## Knight: * Changed Sacrifice icon. :breast_feeding:
## Herbalist: * Replaced Defile with Abscission - Make an Unseen member appear as Blue Dragon tonight. Unlimited uses.
## Mastermind: * Can't Touch This now hides the Mastermind's occupy immunity again.
## Noble & Aristocrat: * Snoop limited to 1 use. Improved Snoop, so that the journals will now transfer over when converted.
## Nightwatch: * Changed Watch Carefully - Reveal all players that visit the Unseen. 2 uses.
## Observer: * Changed Window Peek - Discover all classes that visit a player. You will not know who visited. 2 uses.
## Physician: * Renamed to Medic and recieved new night abilities. * Night Ability First Aid - Heal a player back to life if they were attacked. * Night Ability Quarantine - Heal a player's poison and bleeding, and prevent all visitors. Can only be used on a player once.
## Princess: * Flirt now show Killer/Support and Offensive/Social. * Will-o-Wisp changed - Discover a player's faction. 3 uses.
## Psycho King: * Now permanently death immune at night. * Abilities no longer count as visiting.
## Ritualist: * Tornado reduced to two uses. * Brotherhood changed to single target, uses increased to three.
## Sorcerer: * Magic Dust uses reduced to 2. * Circle of Death uses reduced to 2. * New Day Ability Magic Cloak - Hides your visits at night. 2 uses.
## Bug Fixes: * Fixed a bug with some abilities not being usable during trials. * No longer shows multiple healing messages. * Fixed a bug where sometimes people wouldn't show up as visiting. The only abilities or classes that shouldn't show up as visiting will say so in the class card. * Some others.
_______________________
# Casual Game Mode:
## Core Differences: * Changed almost all Blue Dragon classes and their conversions. * Prince remains the same. * The max number of each non-unique Blue Dragon class is 3. * Only the Unseen can spawn. * The Sorcerer and Inquisitor cannot spawn, but all other neutrals still can. * There is no Royal Blood.
## Magistrate - Investigative Blue Dragon * Spawns every game, is unique, and is unconvertable. * Day Ability Scout - Send a scout to watch a player. You will be alerted if they are converted. * Night Ability Expert Investigation - Determine if a player is part of the Unseen. * Night Ability Surveillance - Prevent visitors and learn the name of those that try. You will be alerted if an Unseen member tries. 3 uses.
## Princess - Investigative Blue Dragon * Same as Classic
## Knight - Killer Blue Dragon * Same as Classic
## Butler - Offensive Blue Dragon * Same as Classic
## Mystic - Social Blue Dragon * Passive Call the Dead - Communicate with the dead at night. * Day Ability Telepathy - Telepathically send a message to everyone, they will not know who sent it. 2 uses. * Day Ability Private Matter - All whispers to and from you will be hidden from the public. 2 uses. * Night Ability Read Mind - See whispers to and from a player tomorrow. Cannot target King. Does not count as visiting.
## Medic - Support Blue Dragon * Same as Classic
## Duchess - Investigative Unseen (Converted from Princess) * Same as Classic
## Enforcer - Support Unseen (Converted from Knight) * Same as Classic
## Servant - Offensive Unseen (Converted from Butler) * Same as Classic
## Seer - Social Unseen (Converted from Mystic) * Day Ability Telepathy - Telepathically send a message to everyone, they will not know who sent it. 2 uses. * Day Ability Private Matter - All whispers to and from you will be hidden from the public. 2 uses. * Night Ability Read Mind - See whispers to and from a player tomorrow. Cannot target King. Does not count as visiting. * Night Ability Mind Warp - Cause a player to receive incorrect feedback from their abilities.
## Herbalist - Support Unseen (Converted from Medic) * Same as Classic

item.title: Preview of Patch 1.1.0 2: Electric Boogaloo
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
First off, as another user said, I love the game. If my tone is alarmed, it’s because as someone who loves the game and has put in many, many hours, I do feel protective over elements that I feel are strengths.

Ellie:

Replaced Defile with Abscission - Make an Unseen member appear as Blue Dragon tonight. Unlimited uses.

For me, Defile was possibly the most fun ability in the game. It rewarded clever deception in a unique way that, when used correctly, has won me the game for Unseen. It’s an ability that feels Unseen to use, and is a good alternative to when you would want to trick people with the fake attack/heal. I’m upset this will be replaced with a generic disguising ability that doesn’t match at all with the class or demand much thought in its use.

Ellie:

Changed Watch Carefully - Reveal all players that visit the Unseen. 2 uses.

This is an interesting change that has potential. Feeds into the “information is power” part of the game that’s fun.

Ellie:

Night Ability First Aid - Heal a player back to life if they were attacked.
Night Ability Quarantine - Heal a player’s poison and bleeding, and prevent all visitors. Can only be used on a player once.

Like others, I’m very alarmed at this change. No more rezzing? So the dead have more reason to just leave when you’re killed. I just played a game today where I got rezzed and all the dead BD put our heads together to figure out who to CS, then put in the death note the others we suspected. It worked and we helped earn BD a win. No more Death Knights = dead will disengage.

Ellie:

Will-o-Wisp changed - Discover a player’s faction. 3 uses.

Interesting change and perhaps for the better, but the old WoW was an interesting, unique ability. Granted, its usefulness was usually a result of chance.

Ellie:

Magic Dust uses reduced to 2.
Circle of Death uses reduced to 2.
New Day Ability Magic Cloak - Hides your visits at night. 2 uses.

I’m interested to see if this combined with the indirect neutral buff from removing Allies (though we will see whether Princess simply replaces King in this regard) boosts Ms. Sorc’s win rate. However, I still believe we need to rethink the Sorcerer/Inquisitor situation in general. The Sorcerer is not neutral in any form other than name. Why are we still treating/balancing her as though she is?

Ellie:

Bug Fixes:

Excellent!

And to clarify this: I played with the king in beta who did not have a starting ability but just guards and the voting abilities. The King back then was not boring, if you actually cared to play like a leader. It had one problem tho, it was increasingly often being lynched. The solution(buff it tremendously with allies has had horrible consequences: BD and Unseen had very low win rates with their opposing King present. That is why Allies had to go.
An execution punishment is the only way to go for King. It’s presence makes its faction powerful enough by adding another member. Giving it gamesolving power was gamebreaking. Not for the win rates as a whole but rather for the win rates of the opposing faction.

Allies was BS and needed to go. Hopefully it will stay gone this time.

I don’t mind seeing it go. I’d just rather the King not be made completely powerless and useless in the process, and this patch is doing that. The King needs to be powerful, be it for good or evil, just maybe a little less powerful than allies but more powerful than the current, proposed version.

NuclearBurrito:

And that’s the intention. I’d say it should do fine at fulfilling it and will help everyone involved by existing even if you personally don’t play it

I don’t disagree that it will help new players. I disagree with the claim that it’s new content.
I also dislike it cos A) It will split the playerbase and B) might screw up game waiting times if one mode proves more popular than the other.

NuclearBurrito:

A 1 use ability like snoop is great because you cannot use it to accuse and confirm yourself. You can either do one or the other. With 2 uses that’s not true. This is relevant with classes like Possessor who can fake the maid spy.

I think the Noble is still currently boring and useless unless it survives to late game. My point regarding this change was that it changed nothing about those aspects and just left him boring and useless until late game. Noble, if it was going to be changed, should be changed to address the fact that 8 out of 10 people currently hate the class still.

RHCube:

That’s a good thing. Revive was overpowered.

It wasn’t though. You had 2 guards, which, depending on the state of the game, would either kill someone or miss, and the CS, which, again, depending on the state of the game, could be powerful or useless. It was nice and balanced imo, especially since you couldn’t sit around once revived to figure things out, you only had 3 nights.

Removing DK wasn’t a balance, it was a change. Altering the heals of the Physician? Unnecessary.

Yattien:
